title: Bonus Episode -  Charles Murray and Omar Epps discuss 'The Devil You Know'
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Writer/producer Charles Murray and Omar Epps sit down to discuss their new film 'The Devil You Know' and the concept and importance of portraying Black lives in a different manner. They also discuss the legacy of past projects they have been involved in such as 'Juice', 'Sons of Anarchy' and more. They also share their opinion on the Chris Rock and Will Smith incident at this years Oscars. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
